original_text: If God has helped you to make others strong, then you should do that. If God has helped you to share your things with others, do that seriously. If God has helped you to be a leader, do that carefully. If God has helped you to be kind to others, do that happily.
korean_text: 혹 위로하는 자면 위로하는 일로, 구제하는 자는 성실함으로, 다스리는 자는 부지런함으로, 긍휼을 베푸는 자는 즐거움으로 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: If God has helped you to make others strong
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 당신이 다른 이들을 강하게 만들도록 도우셨다면

sentences.original_text: If God has helped you to share your things with others
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 당신이 자신의 것들을 다른 이들과 나누도록 도우셨다면

sentences.original_text: If God has helped you to be a leader
If God has helped you to be kind to others
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 당신이 다른 이들에게 친절하도록 도우셨다면
